mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIARY(user_login_id, diary_income_amount, diary_expense_amount, diary_date) VALUES(#{user_login_id}, #{diary_income_amount}, #{diary_expense_amount}, #{diary_date})
mapper.select: select diary_item_category, sum(diary_item_amount) max from hana.diary_item where diary_id in (select diary_id from hana.diary where user_login_id=#{user_id} and diary_date LIKE #{date}) and diary_item_amount < 0 group by diary_item_category order by max asc;
